title: Audio-Based Advanced Mathematics Concept Course: Efficient Learning Design for Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical operations and graph interpretation abilities
context.additional_context: Case-centered curriculum to enhance job applicability for current practitioners, combining twice-weekly online audio sessions with weekly offline workshops

learning_goals: Learners will be able to explain intermediate-level mathematical problem-solving strategies with over 80% accuracy through audio lectures.
Participants will independently solve real-world data interpretation problems using audio tutorials three or more times.
Learners will achieve at least 75% mastery of scenario-based math problems from formative assessments linked to an audio feedback system.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
